A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If you are looking for simplistic storytelling\, this movie is not for you (Stick with the Prequels) However\, if you are ready for depth\, emotion\, and intelligent storytelling\, you are going to Love Star Wars: The Last Jedi. The characters have clear 3 dimensions and growth. The action is great but doesn't define the  movie. I highly recommend
